metadata.title: CVE-2024-4774 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The `ShmemCharMapHashEntry()` code was susceptible to potentially undefinedbehavior by bypassing the move semantics for one of its data members. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 126.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-4774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '126.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
